product_name: Gibbon Fun Line Slackline Set - 12 meters - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Gibbon Funline Slackline offers extra grip for slacklining novices or kids thanks to a rubberized coating to help feet stay on the line. 2 in. wide webbing can be mounted just a couple feet off the ground. Consisting of only 2 parts, the Gibbon Funline Slackline kit can be quickly rigged between 2 trees and set up at a length from 8 - 40 ft. Integrated ratchet lets you set the tension just right; keep it loose for lots of bounce or tighten it up some for more stability. Kit includes slackline, ratchet and instruction manual. Closeout.
short_description: The Gibbon Funline Slackline offers extra grip for slacklining novices or kids thanks to a rubberized coating to help feet stay on the line.
